extendedInfo.description: Create and manage to do lists, synchronize them with ProDo.NOTE!!! /* To do Widget does not work if app is moved to SD card. Thisis the restriction of Android OS */Refer to screenshots for help.ProDo helps users to create and effectively manage their To Do lists.Features:- Simplicity and ease of use! We tried to make to do list intuitiveand minimize the number of actions required to create and to manage to dotasks.- Select any of 3 themes. Make your to do list look the way you like.- Synchronization with Google tasks (OAuth technology is used -you will not have to tell the application your password). Smart algorithms effectively syncs your to do list with Google tasks.- Create to do items not only with keyboard but also with a help ofyour microphone. Create To do tasks with one click.- Support of multiple to do lists. ProDo can manage multiple To do lists with multiple to do items.- Extended properties of to do items (Notes, Priority of a To do, Due date etc..).- ProDo has a built-in time tracker to know how much time is spent on acertain to do task.- Alarms for To do items. ProDo supports  notifications for individual to do items.- Minimal system requirements for the application (ProDo  needsthe Internet access to sync with Google Tasks and check for To do updates).- Various customization options allow to "fit" To do manager for yourself.Manage almost each option of To do app lookAll your suggestions about To do list application will be reviewed andtaken into consideration while planning next releases. Please, sendyour feedback to our e-mail support@othelle.com with subject 'ProDo suggestion'.

reviews.title: Simple to use
reviews.comment: So simple to use. No fuss
reviews.author: Eric Ryder

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: One of the best apps in this area. I suggest that repeat task option should be included in future versions. Thanks a lot!
reviews.author: Diogo Fernandes

reviews.title: Good :)
reviews.comment: So far so good. This is keeping me organized, simple to use, has a lot of features I havent gotten around to using. I would recommend this so far.
reviews.author: Siri Mitchell

reviews.title: Pretty good, could use a few more options
reviews.comment: Great app overall. Good options and widget. Clear and easy to use with plenty customizations available.  What I wish it had: 1. scrolling widget (not button scroll) 2. option to change color of text on widget  Overall good app and would recommend it.
reviews.author: Ryan Sabia

reviews.title: Greatest planner & to do list!!
reviews.comment: Priority, colours, subtasks and sub-sub tasks, alarm and great interface... what more do you need? Waiting for an update maybe :)
reviews.author: ciolea cristian

reviews.title: Generally nice
reviews.comment: Generally, works very nice. It misses the option to present all open/pending tasks and a full calendar view to use when defining a future task, e.g. next Thursday...  Developer is not responsive :-(
reviews.author: Shuki Mitz

reviews.title: Another couple if features for 5 stars
reviews.comment: Great interface. Love it. I\'d go with 5 stars if there was a bit more flexibility in the filter options. Would love to be able to filter on \"next week\" and \"this month\"
reviews.author: Jon Harrison

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for over a year now and love it. It does everything I want it to do, yet it\'s very simple to use. I looked at every todo app on the market and I like this one the best.
reviews.author: Nina Mentges

reviews.comment: Good working, easy to understand, fast. If you can make a calendar inside, to pick up date not by + - but by choosing date and day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seems to be fine and logical
reviews.comment: but i would give the fifth star for sharing possibilities with my google calendar as astrid can use it. Other  sides i hope it will be more reliable than astrid.
reviews.author: Krisztina Pusk\303\241s

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I can manage and keep track pf my tasks... keep it up team
reviews.author: Renante Tagapulot

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: Only task Mgr. I have found that meets my needs.
reviews.author: Wesley Wieland

reviews.title: Doesn\'t include all the junk.
reviews.comment: Very good simple list app with sub lists and notes. However I can\'t always clear completed tasks. Usually works the first time, then you have to quit the app for it to work again.
reviews.author: Raymond Sbrega

reviews.title: It does what I need it to do...
reviews.comment: I have not had to use this app very much but when I do use it, I think it works very well. It helps me stay organized. I use it as a grocery list and as my to do list. I would recommend this app to a friend.
reviews.author: Kevin Walsh

reviews.title: Basic features missing
reviews.comment: Pros: 1. Voice recognition button. 2. Clean and fast interface. 3. Gtask integration.   Cons: 1. No was to search tasks. 2. Can\'t edit tasks from filters such as due today, etc. 3. Can\'t see all the projects at one place.
reviews.author: Ravi S Ghosh

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: It keeps track of everything! The tasks when they need to get done, and if they are completed. You can mark it out of delete the task depending on your preference.
reviews.author: DeeAnn Tinkle

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Great app.....easy to use and well thought out. The only decent one out there that allows you to sort lists well...... thanks guys!
reviews.author: Robert Matthews

reviews.title: PLEASE ADD OPTION TO SET A TIME FOR TASKS ??!
reviews.comment: All this awesome amazingness, and yet it doesn\'t allow me to set a simple TIME of day for a task, along with date and priority?! (Also would LOVE more than the usual 3-4 priority levels, preferably using secondary or tertiary colors :) I need and want my task list for each day to simply look like a filofax or other regular, normal agenda list. I\'m spending all day and half of yesterday seeking an app to replace Astrid. Why is this so hard?! Am I missing something here? Sigh. Thanks.
reviews.author: Linda Redmond

reviews.title: Fitness Trainer
reviews.comment: Great app, keeping my business organized!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: It is great application for google tasks. Perfect widgets, due date and reminder functionality. I am missing a bit only time in due date...
reviews.author: Pavol Grohol
